pages.text: Sets a numeric threshold between 0 and 10,000. Unlike other filters, the amount filter doesn't decide $(o)what$() moves. It decides $(o)how much$() can move. It works differently depending on which side it's on.

pages.title: On Export vs Import
pages.text: $(l)On an export channel:$() Acts as a minimum-retain rule. The source keeps at least this many items. If a chest has 100 cobblestone and the amount is 64, only 36 can be exported.$(br2)$(l)On an import channel:$() Acts as a maximum-fill rule. The destination accepts items until it has this many. If set to 64, the import stops once the target holds 64 of that item.$(br2)You can use both at once. The export says "keep at least X" and the import says "fill up to Y".
